text:
Make some sounds 
*Clicking Tongue*
What kinds of sounds do squirrels like?

Scurry Scurridy Do Scurry Do.... Skew Skew... He's looking at me! Scurridy Scurridy Do
- Haha It's working!
Ohhhh Nooooo.
Funny how that one didn't work....
Fifty pesos to get in here.
It was actually really sweet. Very much
worth it.
It's called the Prismas Basalticos

and... Basal.. Basalticos?
- Basalticos.
- Yeah.
It's filled with columnar basalt which
is what the rock type is called.
It's really unique. We had a fantastic time it was
really beautiful here. You should come,
it's only two hours away from Mexico
City and... what's the really close town

that's beautiful? Huasca?
- Huasca 
- Check it out too!
Experience over Possessions

Kick the Grind.
- Kick the Grind!
Catch you later!
